formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: Property that XML-serialized repository object criteria will be returned into

formElement.label: Already-Serialized Repository Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Already-XML-serialized list of repository object criteria created using procedure SerializeRepositoryObjectCriteria (optional, the resorce object criteria specified below are appended to this)

editor.formElement: entry Object Type: ObjName 1 Repository object criteria to append: resource type #### Make this a drop-dowp

formElement.label: Object Name:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: Object Name (applies to object types AProfile, CConfig, Exits, Scheme, TFGroup, and TFRule)

formElement.label: Change Package ID:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object Change Package ID (applies to object types ChgPkg, CmdAssociation, KeyAssociation, PScheme, and ReadyLst)

formElement.label: CICS Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object CICS Configuration (applies to object types CmdAssociation and KeyAssociation)

formElement.label: CICS Group:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object CICS group (applies to object types CmdAssociation and KeyAssociation)

formElement.label: CICS Object Type:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object CICS object type (applies to object types CmdAssociation and KeyAssociation)

formElement.label: CICS Object Name:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object CICS object name (applies to object types CmdAssociation and KeyAssociation)

formElement.label: Scheme:
formElement.documentation: Repository object criteria to append: object scheme (applies to object types PScheme and ReadyLst)

editor.formElement: entry Object Instance: ObjectInstance 0 Repository object criteria to append: optional, if it is omitted the contents of the latest instance will be returned #### Check this
